name: Nekomancer (phillips-albright, Udayan Senapati (CurryIs2Hot4U), Aaron King, zenntavros, Ethan Smith)
name_original: Nekomancer (phillips-albright, Udayan Senapati (CurryIs2Hot4U), Aaron King, zenntavros, Ethan Smith)
description:
A game made for the Red Storm and VGDC @ NCSU game jam, where the theme was zombie cats.

You are a cat who was raised from the dead, and now you have to search for ingredients to make a cure for your zombification. Along the way you will have to make potions to transform you and use different abilities to find the correct ingredients.
